name: Lotus Enterprise
description: Enterprise-grade platform for large-scale workflows, governance, integrations, and high-availability deployments.

name: Lotus Community Edition
description: Free developer-friendly edition for prototyping, learning, and local experimentation with a vibrant plugin ecosystem.

name: Lotus for Wealth
description: Toolkit and data layer for building wealth management products: client portfolios, risk profiling, and advisory workflows.

name: Wealth Connect
description: Secure network layer to connect wealth communities worldwide with identity, messaging, and trust-based introductions.
